text: The beast that yoʋ saw was, and is not, and is about to come up out of the abyss and go to destruction. Those who dwell on the earth, 17:8 whose names have ¦ everyone whose name has K ANT BYZ CT HFwhose names have not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, will be amazed when they see 17:8 that the beast ¦ the beast, because he ANT BYZ CT PCK TRthat the beast was and is not and 17:8 is to come ¦ yet is TRis to come.
